amendatorysection.catchline: Plea in bar or abatement; verification by accused required.
amendatorysection.para: No plea in bar or abatement shall be received by the court unless it be in writing, signed by the accused, and sworn to before some competent officer.

annotation.para: Plea in bar must be sworn to by accused as prerequisite to validity. Schrum v. State, 108 Neb. 186, 187 N.W. 801 (1922).
